overview: A couple of roving vagabonds hitch a freight to the railroad town of Linda, and between bouts with the fright-yard bulls and other drifters, find romance in the persons of two waitresses at the camp restaurant. American-slang rules the dialogue to the point non-USA viewers need a slang-glossary to follow the dialogue.
tagline: TWO FAMOUS STARS OF "IS ZAT SO" TEAMED FOR THE FIRST TIME ON THE SCREEN
title: Oh, Yeah!
